message: I'll take 60% of the money, leaving you with 40%. It's a fair start to the game!
I'll take 70%, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
I'm willing to compromise and give you 45% of the money, but I'm still looking for a fair deal for myself.
I'll take 55%, but I'm getting closer to my target
I'm willing to split the money 50/50, let's meet in the middle!
